line.comment: * PIRACY: CONTROL LIBRARY -by- MISTER BEAR v1.30 Dec-2010
* DESCRIPTION: Functions for creating faux controls using text
* CREATE SUBTITLE PROGRESS BAR : Creates a progress bar control for display as a subtitle
* ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Size of the progress bar (in characters between 10 and 100)
* ARGUMENT 3 : [optional][string] String to be displayed on RHS instead of a percentage (see below)
* : null or 0 : Default colour scheme : red-orange-yellow-green (default)
* : 16 : Disabled colour scheme : bar is drawn in grey
* Calculate number of bars and dashes
* CREATE PROGRESS BAR : Creates a progress bar control for a custom menu
* ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Size of the progress bar (in characters between 10 and 100)
* ARGUMENT 3 : [optional][string] String to be displayed on RHS instead of a percentage (see below)
* : null or 0 : Default colour scheme : red-orange-yellow-green (default)
* : 16 : Disabled colour scheme : bar is drawn in grey
* Calculate number of bars and dashes
* Repair gaps created by using integer maths
* CREATE SUBTITLE MARQUEE BAR : Creates a coloured bouncing bar
* Convert frame number to a character offset
* Create LHS, centre and RHS strings
* VALIDATE PROGRESS BAR PARAMETERS : Enforce max and min progress bar percentages and sizes
* CREATE COLOURED PROGRESS BAR : Assemble a progress bar according to the various colour schemes available
* If user hasn't supplied RHS text, create percentage string
* Set colour scheme resource ID offset based on specified percentage
* If the user requested the 'Inverse' gradient scheme, invert the resource offset
* Add base value to create resource ID
* Create bar using appropriate colour ID
* Append RHS text unless user has specified no RHS should be displayed

sval.val: PIRACY: CONTROL LIBRARY -by- MISTER BEAR v1.30 Dec-2010
DESCRIPTION: Functions for creating faux controls using text
CREATE SUBTITLE PROGRESS BAR : Creates a progress bar control for display as a subtitle
ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Size of the progress bar (in characters between 10 and 100)
ARGUMENT 3 : [optional][string] String to be displayed on RHS instead of a percentage (see below)
: null or 0 : Default colour scheme : red-orange-yellow-green (default)
: 16 : Disabled colour scheme : bar is drawn in grey
Calculate number of bars and dashes
CREATE PROGRESS BAR : Creates a progress bar control for a custom menu
ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Size of the progress bar (in characters between 10 and 100)
ARGUMENT 3 : [optional][string] String to be displayed on RHS instead of a percentage (see below)
: null or 0 : Default colour scheme : red-orange-yellow-green (default)
: 16 : Disabled colour scheme : bar is drawn in grey
Calculate number of bars and dashes
Repair gaps created by using integer maths
CREATE SUBTITLE MARQUEE BAR : Creates a coloured bouncing bar
Convert frame number to a character offset
Create LHS, centre and RHS strings
VALIDATE PROGRESS BAR PARAMETERS : Enforce max and min progress bar percentages and sizes
CREATE COLOURED PROGRESS BAR : Assemble a progress bar according to the various colour schemes available
If user hasn't supplied RHS text, create percentage string
Set colour scheme resource ID offset based on specified percentage
If the user requested the 'Inverse' gradient scheme, invert the resource offset
Add base value to create resource ID
Create bar using appropriate colour ID
Append RHS text unless user has specified no RHS should be displayed
